TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlCacheDependencyDatabase extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCacheDependencyDatabase Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序配置 SQL 缓存依赖项数据库。

span.span: Configures the SQL cache dependencies databases for an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你以编程方式访问和修改 `databases` `sqlCacheDependency` 配置节中节点的元素 `caching` 。The allows you to programmatically access and modify the `databases` element of the `sqlCacheDependency` node within the `caching` configuration section. SQL 缓存依赖关系允许将缓存的数据与原始源进行同步。The SQL cache dependency allows the cached data to be synchronized with the original source. 在配置 ASP.NET 应用程序的缓存中存储的项与特定 SQL Server 数据库表之间的关系后，类的实例将 监视该表中的可能更改。After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the class monitors the table for possible changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the connection name for the database.

value.span: 一个字符串，用于指定 配置节内的数据库连接字符串的名称。

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a database connection string within the configuration section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许以编程方式访问和修改 `connectionName` `add` `databases` 配置文件中节点的元素的属性。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `connectionName` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. 连接名称标识 `connectionStrings` 包含数据库连接字符串的部分中的元素。The connection name identifies an element in the `connectionStrings` section which contains the database connection string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许以编程方式访问和修改 `name` `add` `databases` 配置文件中节点的元素的属性。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `name` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. `name`属性标识其表用于的数据库 。The `name` attribute identifies the database whose table is used for the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. summary.span: 获取或设置 轮询数据库表更改情况的频率。

span.span: Gets or sets the frequency with which the polls the database table for changes.

value.span: 数据库轮询时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The database polling time, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许以编程方式访问和修改 `pollTime` `add` `databases` 配置文件中节点的元素的属性。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `pollTime` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. 在配置 ASP.NET 应用程序缓存中存储的项与特定 SQL Server 数据库表之间的关系后，类的实例将 监视该表，以便在表中的项发生更改时，该项会自动更新到缓存中或从缓存中删除。After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the class monitors the table so that when an item in the table changes, the item is automatically updated in or removed from the cache. 监视按指定的频率进行 。The monitoring happens at the frequency specified by the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#2)]
